mapper.sql: id, process_id, source_id, `text`, `status`, audit_user, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, deleted
mapper.select: select l.*, u.nick_name username from tb_audit_manage_log l left join sys_user u on l.audit_user = u.user_id where source_id = #{id} and l.deleted = 0 and u.deleted = 0 order by l.create_time;
mapper.update:
update tb_audit_manage_log
id = #{updated.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
process_id = #{updated.processId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source_id = #{updated.sourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
text = #{updated.text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{updated.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
audit_user = #{updated.auditUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{updated.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{updated.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updated.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updated.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deleted = #{updated.deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
where process_id=#{processId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and source_id=#{sourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
